content:
The avatar is at (8, 17). There is a lever at (7, 17) which is currently in the up position ('d'). There is a lever at (9, 17) which is in the down position ('&'). The goal is likely to manipulate these levers. I will start by moving up to interact with the lever at (7, 17).
Action: 4
I'm moving up to reach the lever. I expect to be at location (7,17) in the next state.

The avatar is at (7, 17).
The goal is likely to reach the levers at (8,16) and (9,17).
I should try to move up towards the lever.
Action: 4
I will move up, trying to get closer to the lever.

The avatar is at (7, 17). There is a lever at (8, 16) that is in the left position and another one at (9, 17) in the down position. I need to pick up the suitcase '$' at (8,3). Then I should move to the lever at (9, 17) and flip it up to move the passenger at (9, 21) to the right.
Since I'm at (7,17), and there are walls to the east and west, I can only go up or down. I should go down to get to the lever.
Action: 3
``` Action: 3 ```
I'm moving down towards the lever, hoping to be able to flip it in the next turn.

The avatar 'a' is at row=8, col=17. There is a lever 'd' at row=7, col=17, a lever '*' at row=8, col=16, and a lever 'b' at row=8, col=18, and another lever '&' at row=9, col=17. I need to try to reach one of the levers. Since the avatar is already next to lever '*' and lever 'b', I'll try to move towards it.
Action: 1
I will move left, hoping to interact with the lever at (8, 16).

The avatar 'a' is at row=8, col=16. The leverDown '&' is at row=9, col=17. To reach the lever, I need to go down.
Action:3
I will move down to interact with the lever.

The avatar is currently at (8, 16). There is a lever to the right at (8, 18) and one above at (7, 17), and one below at (9,17). I need to flip the levers. I will try moving right towards the lever first.
Action: 2

The avatar is currently at (8, 17). There's a lever to the left, right, and up. The goal is likely to manipulate the levers and deliver the passenger 'l' to a safe location. Since the avatar is surrounded by levers, I will start by going right to see if I can flip the lever to the right (8,18) first.
Action:2
```Action:2```
I will attempt to flip the lever to the right.

The avatar is at row=8, col=18. There is a lever up (d) at row=7, col=17 and a lever down (&) at row=9, col=17. The avatar is blocked by walls to the east and west. Let's try going up to reach the lever.
Action: 4
I will try to move up to reach the lever.

The avatar is currently at row 8, col 18. I want to reach the lever at row 9, col 17. I need to move down towards it.
Action: 3
I expect to move down one step towards the lever.

The avatar is currently at (8, 18). There's a lever (leverUp) at (7, 17), a lever (leverLeft) at (8, 16), and a lever (leverDown) at (9, 17). I need to toggle the levers to open a path. I'll try moving up to reach the lever at (7,17).

Action: 4
```text
ACTION_UP
```
I expect to move upwards towards the lever at (7,17).
